structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Exemptions from space and bathing facilities requirements for living units of certain assisted-living communities.

text.section: Any assisted-living community that was open or under construction on or before July 14, 2000, shall be exempt from the requirement that each living unit have a bathtub or shower.
Any assisted-living community that was open or under construction on or before July 14, 2000, shall have a minimum of one (1) bathtub or shower for each five (5) clients.

Any assisted-living community that was open or under construction on or before July 14, 2000, shall be exempt from the requirement that each living unit shall be at least two hundred (200) square feet for single occupancy, or for double occupancy if the room is shared with a spouse or another individual by mutual agreement.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 11, effective July 14, 2000.
